channel.title: My First Model + Thread :)
channel.description:
Well This is my First Model Show off.
I plan to actually Release some models to the public, At the moment i can only create Weapons and Sheilds, If anyone can give me a guide to making armour then i will!
This is something i creating first time using this program aswell, I found it while looking through these forums, Its called Sculptris Alpha and is very fun to use :).
Model. [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=472582.0;attach=18959;image[/img] WireFrame. [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=472582.0;attach=18961;image[/img] Reflective paint. [img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=dlattach;topic=472582.0;attach=18963;image[/img]

item.title: My First Model + Thread :)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Strangle:

Haha Thanks And yeah… I dunno how to make lower poly Creations yet… I just Export them to blender and use a modifier to Remove some of the polygons… then current model im working on right now has 1.2m Polys at the moment and should be finished at about 2m polys

Uh… Yeah… You need to work on that part.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Model + Thread :)
item.dc:creator: @Strangle Strangle
item.description:
@Strangle wrote:

Haha Thanks And yeah… I dunno how to make lower poly Creations yet… I just Export them to blender and use a modifier to Remove some of the polygons… then current model im working on right now has 1.2m Polys at the moment and should be finished at about 2m polys

Read full topic

item.title: My First Model + Thread :)
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

885k poly lol. My pc starts lagging at 200k. Not bad, I would watch some tutorials. You can really get good if you stick with it. In about, say a month you could create some really awesome stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: My First Model + Thread :)
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Alright, the pictures are now working. Well, I kind of laughed at them, no, not in a mean type way. I like them a lot, and I’m impressed. There just kind of silly looking. ;D

Read full topic

item.title: My First Model + Thread :)
item.dc:creator: @Strangle Strangle
item.description:
@Strangle wrote:

Yeah i think its because i tried to use the ‘upload’ option on these forums… Stupidest idea… wont do it again.

Read full topic
